body:
**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
It will be great if Temporal adds supports for NATS Streaming, Lifebridge and Jetstream in the future.

**Describe the solution you'd like**
Kafka cluster is too heavy when deploying in cloud. Using NATS Streaming, Lifebridge or Jetstream is more lightweight and golang native

comments.body: Are you suggesting it as a Kafka replacement for internal Temporal needs? Kafka is no longer required to run Temporal in Cloud environment.

title: Add NATS (go native) Streaming, LifeBridge, JetStream support
